update mry_customer set shop_id = #{shopId,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone_number = #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, work = #{work,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, operator_id = #{operatorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, operator_name = #{operatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIT}, total_custome_points = #{totalCustomePoints,jdbcType=BIGINT}, left_points = #{leftPoints,jdbcType=BIGINT}, total_custome_times = #{totalCustomeTimes,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, left_times = #{leftTimes,jdbcType=SMALLINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, create_time from mry_customer where is_deleted = 0 and shop_id = #{shopId} and DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')
